title: My Masters' Nightmare Season 1, Ep. 10 "Stalked"
description: "Sweet women leave a bad aftertaste in my mouth, because I feel guilty for dirtying them." Jagger tightened his grip on my wrists, making me scream into his hand. He smiled and lowered his beautiful face to mine, his expression almost evil. "But you, Camila, would taste so fucking bitter I wouldn't feel any guilt whatsoever." Present:Jagger stalks the women in the house, making some nervous and others excited. (Rita's and Camila's viewpoints).Past:Christo stalks Sophia in the past, while Jagger reveals a dangerous side of his personality. (Sophia's viewpoint).
author: Marita A. Hansen
